definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Sometimes the air masses which meet at a front cause storms.
sentences.chinese: 有时在锋面相遇的气团会造成暴风雨。

sentences.english: The bubble has displaced cold air southward.
sentences.chinese: 这一小气团取代南方冷气团，向南推进。

sentences.english: The bubble has displaced cold air southward.
sentences.chinese: 这一小气团取代南方冷气团，向南推进。

sentences.english: Air moves across land and water in large air masses part.
sentences.chinese: 空气以大气团的形式移过陆地和水面。

sentences.english: The dividing line between the two air masses is called a front.
sentences.chinese: 这两股气团的分界线叫锋面。

sentences.english: The major controlling influence is the inflow of a cold, dry, air mass .
sentences.chinese: 主要支配的影响是干冷气团之流入。

sentences.english: Southward invasion polar cold air mass continued to dominate the Northern Hemisphere's climate.
sentences.chinese: 极地冷气团不断南侵，主宰了北半球的气候。

sentences.english: The huge sadness of the northern plains rolled down on him.
sentences.chinese: 北地平原的悲凄气团笼罩在他身上。

sentences.english: Another cold wave will arrive next week so people should pay attention to staying warm.
sentences.chinese: 下周又有一波冷气团报到，呼吁民众要注意保暖。

sentences.english: The cloud first became bigger and then suddenly shrunk.
sentences.chinese: 原子气团先是变大，然后突然收缩。

sentences.english: Evaporation fog forms by the mixing of two unsaturated air masses.
sentences.chinese: 由两个搅拌蒸发雾形式不饱和气团。

definition: pubic region/point two inches below the navel where one's qi resides
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
